pkgmetadata.longdescription: sshfp generates DNS SSHFP records from SSH public keys. sshfp can take public keys from a known_hosts file or from scanning the host's sshd daemon. The ssh client can use these SSHFP records if you set "VerifyHostKeyDNS yes" in the file /etc/ssh/ssh_config or ~/.ssh/config. See RFC-4255
